text:
Thrombotic Thrombocytopenia after #ChAdOx1 nCov-19 #Vaccination 

Vaccination with #oxfordastrazeneca #COVID19  #vaccine can result in the rare development of immune thrombotic thrombocytopenia mediated by platelet-activating antibodies against PF4
https://t.co/MeABuDj4h2 https://t.co/KKIhukKKnW
